modName: MASTERS OF THE UNIVERSE - HERO AND VILLAIN COMPANIONS
summary: This mod adds over a dozen companions based on the He-Man and She-Ra cartoons/comic series.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds over a dozen heroes and villains from the He-Man and She-Ra cartoons. These characters are integrated into the world, and found in a variety of locations listed below. These characters are all owned by the original creators and/or Mattel, my interpretations of them may be different than someone else\\\'s. They are simply based on those characters, not necessarily them.

*The style of characters/faces that I enjoy is certainly not the same preference as everyone, you must decide what types of face mods you want to use.

*Any derogatory/abusive or \"out of line\" comments will be reported. Please be constructive in comments.

*I am open to suggestions/requests for new characters to be added... ask and you shall receive as I am always open to new character ideas.

*These characters are my interpretation of the originals... if you don\'t like them then move on.

*My Skeletor doesn\'t look like him (He is a WIP right now)... there are other skeletor followers on the nexus which are better http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30324

*I only made this mod as a request, it contains only named companions (no armors or weapons) do not ask for these as I do not make armors or weapons. I would recommend TERA armors for some of the characters.

They are all:

Essential
Marriageable
Local Dismissing

Companions:

He-Man - Nord (One-Handed Warrior)(Blades/Shield) Palace of Kings
Teela - Nord - (One-Handed Warrior)(Blades/Shield) Palace of Kings
Man-At-Arms - Nord (One-Handed Warrior)(Maces/Shield) Palace of Kings
King Randor - Nord (One-Handed Warrior)(Blades/Shield) Palace of Kings
Queen Marlena - Imperial (Scout)(Archery/Stealth/Restoration) Palace of Kings
Orko - Dark Elf Mini (Destruction Mage)(Destruction/Alteration/Conjuration) Palace of Kings
Sorceress - Nord (Mage Elemental)(Destruction/Alteration/Restoration) College of Magic
She-ra - Nord (0ne-Handed Warrior)(Blades/Shield/Restoration) Understone Keep
Bow - Nord (Bard)(Archery/Stealth/Illusion) Understone Keep
Sea Hawk - Nord (Rogue)(Blades/Dual/Stealth) Winking Skeever
Glimmer - Nord (Mystic)(Illusion/Alteration/Restoration) Falkreath Jarls Home
Frosta - Nord (Destruction Mage)(Destruction/Stealth/Alteration/Conjuration) Dawnstar Jarl House 
Castaspella - Breton (Mage Elemental)(Restoration/Alteration/Destruction) Winterhold Jarl House
Catra - Khajit (Assassin)(Blades/Fists/Stealth) Winking Skeever
Skeletor - Vampire Nord (Sorcerer)(Blades/Illusion/Destruction) Harkon\'s Castle
Evil-Lyn - Imperial (Necromancer)(Conjuration/Alteration/Restoration) Harkon\'s Castle
Beast Man - Orc (Barbarian)(2-Handed Weapons/Rage) Harkon\'s Castle
Mer-Man - Argonian (Spellsword)(Blades/Alteration) Whiterun Jail

Required Mods:

Apachiskyhair 1.5 by Apachi - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
ApachiFemales by Apachi, 1.2 and 1.3
ApachiMales by Apachi
More Hair Colors (I have both files active) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14713

Hearthfire
Dawnguard
Dragonborn

Recommended Mods (But not required):

UFO - Ultimate follower overhaul. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037 
TERA Armors - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846

Fine Face Textures by urshi - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815
Eyes of Beauty - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
Better Facegen - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953
Better Males http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488 
Better Females http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812 
Body mods (Calientes) 
One of the sexy armor mods out there. (Skimpy) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654
SageOutfit http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10710 and/or http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9387 
Cloaks http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092 
Witch Hat (Orko) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11049

Special Thanks:

Apachi in particular for the awesome hair mod! You are an inspiration to modders.
All modders whose mods I have linked to, your work has greatly enhanced Skyrim.
Bethesda for Skyrim, thank you for the beautiful game!
author: Scorpiovaeden
